subtasks.description:
Implement cross-provider message transformation

Port pi-mono's context handoff: convert thinking blocks to <thinking> tags when switching providers mid-session. Implement transformMessagesForProvider(messages, targetApi) in the unified chat abstraction. Enable workflows like starting with cheap models and escalating to expensive ones.
